languages.text: {n}Паскаль обращает к вам взор, и в зрачке его глаза пылает звездное пламя. Из вокса его вырывается лишь одно слово:{/n} "Реставрация".
{n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль обращает к вам взор, и в зрачке его глаза пылает звездное пламя. Из вокса его вырывается лишь одно слово:{/n} "Реставрация".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you. The pupil of his eye is bright with the fire of stars. A single word escapes from his vox.{/n} "Restoration."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはあなたへと視線を移す。その瞳には美しい炎が灯っていた。一言、彼のヴォクスから発せられる。{/n}「復元」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはあなたへと視線を移す。その瞳には美しい炎が灯っていた。一言、彼のヴォクスから発せられる。{/n}「復元」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看向你，他的瞳孔闪耀着如天界而来的火焰。他的音阵只发出了一个词。{/n}“复原。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看向你，他的瞳孔闪耀着如天界而来的火焰。他的音阵只发出了一个词。{/n}“复原。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous, ses pupilles étincelant d'un feu céleste particulièrement ardent. Son vox ne produit qu'un seul mot :{/n} « Restauration ».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous, ses pupilles étincelant d'un feu céleste particulièrement ardent. Son vox ne produit qu'un seul mot :{/n} « Restauration ».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal posa la mirada en ti y ves sus pupilas brillando con un fuego celestial. Su voco emite una sola palabra:{/n} «Restauración».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal posa la mirada en ti y ves sus pupilas brillando con un fuego celestial. Su voco emite una sola palabra:{/n} «Restauración».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich an. In seinen Pupillen brennt ein himmlisches Licht. Ein einziges Wort entweicht seinem Vox:{/n} "Restoration."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich an. In seinen Pupillen brennt ein himmlisches Licht. Ein einziges Wort entweicht seinem Vox:{/n} "Restoration."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Göz bebekleri semavi bir ateşle yanan Pasqal, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Voksundan sadece iki kelime çıkıyor.{/n} "Yeniden Yapılanma."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns his gaze to you, his pupils burning bright with celestial fire. A single word escapes from his vox:{/n} "Restoration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın göz bebekleri semavi bir ateşle yanıyor ve Tekno Rahip bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Voksundan sadece iki kelime çıkıyor:{/n} "Yeniden Yapılanma."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
